Articles.Content: No, but I\'ve been thinking about making a mod that will put a rocket there...

> 
> Can you launch from KSP2???

Wait, wat? 

KSP 2? Can someone please explain this?

> 
> Wait, wat? 
> 
> KSP 2? Can someone please explain this?

I \*think\* he means the other space center on Kerbin.

> 
> Wait, wat? 
> 
> KSP 2? Can someone please explain this?

Just hop over here and open the spoilers on this post: [http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12608.msg196457#msg196457](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12608.msg196457#msg196457)
Someone rolled a truck to it using the cart plugin. Then they launched it.

Not at the moment, but it might end up that its possible to fly from there in the future. Who knows what the Dev team has planned (except at least one of the voluntares, and possibly one or two of the mods).
